sentences.en: A farmer has a lovely dog, its name is Bingo.
sentences.cn: 有个农夫,他有只可爱的狗狗, 名叫宾果.

sentences.en: A timely bingo win brought some cheer to Juliet Little's family yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天玩宾戈赢了一把，适时地给朱丽叶·利特尔一家带来些许的欢快心情。

sentences.en: Bingo! That’s the one I’ve been looking for.
sentences.cn: 太好了！ 那正是我一直在找的。

sentences.en: But Bingo - yes , Bingo really is his name - o - was her favorite.
sentences.cn: 还有 Bingo (游戏名字)----他确实是叫 Bingo ----o是 他的最爱.

sentences.en: Control number of bingo cards to be printed on each card sheet.
sentences.cn: 控制人数,宾果卡上印上每卡表.

sentences.en: Dignitary Bingo, ten bucks a sheet; are you in?
sentences.cn: 猜人物宾果游戏, 一页十美元, 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Ever Notice How Work Boots Get Better With Age? Bingo.
sentences.cn: 是否曾注意过工作靴是越穿越好? 那就是了!

sentences.en: He told you he wanted to be cremated at bingo?
sentences.cn: 喝酒的时候他告诉你他想要火葬?

sentences.en: I'll hazard a dollar on the bingo game.
sentences.cn: 我在这局宾果游戏上赌一元钱.

sentences.en: Now Charlie knows that all BINGO Kids have to do chores.
sentences.cn: 现在查理知道了,所有的宾果孩子们都要做家务.

sentences.en: Teacher: Bingo. What kind of cats walk with two feet?
sentences.cn: 没错, 什么猫是用两只脚走路的?

sentences.en: The computer program searches, and bingo! We've got a match.
sentences.cn: 电脑程序在搜索，瞧！找到匹配的了。

sentences.en: The local cinema has been made into a bingo hall.
sentences.cn: 当地的电影院已改建成宾戈游戏厅了.

sentences.en: The new bingo hall stands four - square to the old town hall.
sentences.cn: 那个新建的宾戈娱乐厅屹立在旧市政厅的正前方.

sentences.en: There are Bible quiz books, stuffed with crosswords and other word puzzles, and Bible bingo games.
sentences.cn: 还有圣经谜题书, 里面全是填字游戏和其它字谜, 还有圣经宾果(bingo)游戏.

sentences.en: Tricia: Bingo ! Say, do you like oysters?
sentences.cn: 翠西雅: 答对了! 对了, 你爱吃牡蛎 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a game played for money or prizes, in which numbers are chosen by chance and called out, and if you have the right numbers on your card, you win

trans.tran_cn: 宾果游戏，太好了，好极了
